title: Desktop/laptop ownership among U.S. adults 2008 to 2019
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of U.S. adults for 9 number of Months.
The Share of U.S. adults is highest at Month November 2016 and lowest at Month January 2018.
The minimum Month January 2018 has got 1.07 times less Share of U.S. adults than the maximum Month November 2016.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Share of U.S. adults in the y axis.
The Share of U.S. adults is highest at Month November 2016 and lowest at Month January 2018.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of U.S. adults for 9 number of Months.
The Share of U.S. adults is highest at Month November 2016 and lowest at Month January 2018.
The minimum Month January 2018 has got 1.07 times less Share of U.S. adults than the maximum Month November 2016.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of U.S. adults for 9 number of Months.
The maximum Share of U.S. adults 78.0 is found at Month November 2016 and the minimum is found at January 2018 where Month is 73.0.
Second maximum Share of U.S. adults is found at Month June 2010.
The maximum Month November 2016 has got 1.07 times higher Share of U.S. adults than the minimum Month January 2018.
Month November 2016 is higher than any other Months with value 78.0, followed by June 2010, and June 2010. Down to Month January 2018 with the lowest value 73.0.
The Share of U.S. adults has remained stable over the past 9 Months.
Similar Share of U.S. adults is found in Month February 2019, April 2016, and January 2008.
The highest value 78.0 at November 2016 is almost 1.04 times larger than the average value 75.22.
